r a long nap." Her body felt stiff from such a long

ack.  "Oh my," she said as she put her paw

empty. She sighed heavily.  "Well,
  > if I'm out of food, I have to go for=
age. But that means," she

face." She looked down

o go up sooner or

y towards the

ver her eyes
